description:
Suggests and completes words as you type! Write faster and more efficiently.

#### Using
1. Start typing somewhere. After the first few characters, a suggestion box will appear.
2. Use the Up and Down arrow keys to select an entry if the currently selected one is not the desired word.
3. Press Enter or Tab to trigger the completion with the currently selected word.
4. Alternatively, press one of Alt + 1, Alt + 2, ..., Alt + 9, Alt + 0 to trigger completion with the 1st, 2nd, ..., 9th, and 10th word, respectively.
summary: Suggests and completes words as you type
author: Anthony Zhang
